data.name: Master of the Harem Guild
data.detailed_description:
Damien, a "Monster Tamer" living in a fantasy world is scorned by the beautiful members of a prestigious guild. He embarks on a quest for revenge by heading into the Forest of Evil to become stronger and to prove to those who doubted him that he has the makings of a great hero! Instead of acquiring strength and skills in the forest Damien instead encounters a demon who grants him an 'unexpected' power that will help him stick it to those beautiful ladies from the guild who made fun of him.

With his new found powers in tow Damien sets out to get his revenge on the four people who laughed him out of the guild's recruitment event. Alicia is the Priestess, a gentle healer who might be too innocent for her own good.  Tina, a deadly sniper who earned herself the nickname of "Demon Bullet Princess", who is a spunky gal who wears her heart on her sleeve. Sara, a powerful witch, her cold attitude earned her the nickname "Ice Blade". Sonia the Paladin rounds out the group, her impenetrable defense is her greatest pride as she claims to have put aside her womanhood to pursue becoming a great hero.

Join Damien as he plots and schemes to exact his ultimate revenge on the 'Knights of the Round' and where his lewd machinations cause the gears in a much bigger plan to fall into place and put the world in more peril that one could imagine!

Master of the Harem Guild is the localization of a Japanese Visual Novel developed by Miel, we at Cherry Kiss aim to provide this authentic Japanese visual novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.
data.about_the_game:
Damien, a "Monster Tamer" living in a fantasy world is scorned by the beautiful members of a prestigious guild. He embarks on a quest for revenge by heading into the Forest of Evil to become stronger and to prove to those who doubted him that he has the makings of a great hero! Instead of acquiring strength and skills in the forest Damien instead encounters a demon who grants him an 'unexpected' power that will help him stick it to those beautiful ladies from the guild who made fun of him.

With his new found powers in tow Damien sets out to get his revenge on the four people who laughed him out of the guild's recruitment event. Alicia is the Priestess, a gentle healer who might be too innocent for her own good.  Tina, a deadly sniper who earned herself the nickname of "Demon Bullet Princess", who is a spunky gal who wears her heart on her sleeve. Sara, a powerful witch, her cold attitude earned her the nickname "Ice Blade". Sonia the Paladin rounds out the group, her impenetrable defense is her greatest pride as she claims to have put aside her womanhood to pursue becoming a great hero.

Join Damien as he plots and schemes to exact his ultimate revenge on the 'Knights of the Round' and where his lewd machinations cause the gears in a much bigger plan to fall into place and put the world in more peril that one could imagine!

Master of the Harem Guild is the localization of a Japanese Visual Novel developed by Miel, we at Cherry Kiss aim to provide this authentic Japanese visual novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.
data.short_description: Damien attempts to join a prestigious guild of beautiful monster hunters but is denied membership due to his lowly status and ugly appearance. In an attempt to get stronger he unsheathes a "power" nobody would have expected. Join Damien's quest to exact revenge on all who have scorned him.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core m3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920 x 1080
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Master of the Harem Guild

content_descriptors.notes:
- Large portions of the game include nudity, profane language, and graphic descriptions of sexual activities.
- The game contains sexual intercourse involving a virgin female thus some blood is visible in these scenes.
- The male protagonist occasionally uses ejaculate as a means of attack when facing off against certain enemies.
- There is a heavy focus of moral corruption and degradation of the female characters. 
- All lead female characters will unavoidably become pregnant by the end of the game, and will have intercourse while pregnant.
- Due to 'magical' capabilities of the protagonist some instances of sex contain elements of dubious to non-consent.
- Some sexual encounters feature what could be considered 'extreme elements' such as; having public sex, a character being urinated on, group sex, body writing, creative use of tools for sexual gratification, seducing another character's romantic partner, an intoxicated female character propositioning a male character for sex, using magic/drugs to put a character to sleep, sex with a sleeping character.
